data.benefits: The scheme provides Term Loan (Rupee or Foreign Currency) for upto Rs 2000 lakhs to MSME and for Service providers/ aggregators up to Rs 5000 lakhs with a moratorium period of upto 2 years.
data.eligibility: All Manufacturing and Service providers (RESCOs, ESCOs, EPCs, Vendors etc) and MSMEs on either supply side or demand side of the green value chain are eligibile undre this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Repayment upto 7 years. 
  2. MSMEs executing projects/providing services, must be related to the activities i.e. Energy Efficiency, Renewable Energy, Compressed Bio Gas, Water & Waste Water Management, Solid Waste Management, E-Mobility, etc.
data.beneficiaries: All Manufacturing and Service providers (RESCOs, ESCOs, EPCs, Vendors etc) and MSMEs on either supply side or demand side of the green value chain are eligibile undre this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Repayment upto 7 years. 
  2. MSMEs executing projects/providing services, must be related to the activities i.e. Energy Efficiency, Renewable Energy, Compressed Bio Gas, Water & Waste Water Management, Solid Waste Management, E-Mobility, etc.
data.nodal_agency: Small Inudstries Development Bnak Of India (SIDBI)
data.context: The Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) has introduced a Green Finance Scheme (GFS) to support environmentally friendly projects in the MSME sector.
data.objective: The GFS aims to promote sustainable practices and green initiatives within MSMEs.
data.description: The scheme provides Term Loan (Rupee or Foreign Currency) for upto Rs 2000 lakhs to MSME and for Service providers/ aggregators up to Rs 5000 lakhs with a moratorium period of upto 2 years.
data.funding_facilitator: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
data.funding_mechanism: The applicants will get the benefit after the approval of application by SIDBI.
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate
Detailed Project Report
Bank statements
Income tax return
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : 15, Ashok Marg, Lucknow - 226001, Uttar Pradesh
